name: Tongsheng Haoran Coal Mine
company_mentions: 大同煤矿集团同生浩然煤业有限公司

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%A4%A7%E5%90%8C%E7%85%A4%E7%9F%BF%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E5%90%8C%E7%94%9F%E6%B5%A9%E7%84%B6%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Tongsheng Haoran Coal Mine is a shaft coal mine located in the village of 羊圈沟村, 长梁沟镇, 原平市, 忻州市, 山西省

operators: 大同煤矿集团同生浩然煤业有限公司
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Tongsheng Haoran Coal Industry Co., Ltd., which is a subsidiary of Jinneng Group.
